website_summaries.verdict: A medium-weight fleece jacket that's perfect for those who like lots of pockets.
pros: A midweight fleece jacket that’s good for layering in cooler weather
Has plenty of pockets for when a purse isn’t convenient, including 2 outside, 2 hidden inside, and a small one on the sleeve
cons: Some colors aren’t what customers expected
A bit roomy if you have a smaller chest

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this last minute for a trip to Peru, and I've been basically living in it! It's very warm and comfy. I would have preferred it to be a bit more fitted, longer sleeves, and a bit longer to cover my rear, but overall it looks cute on. It's kept me warm in temperatures in the 60s. Any colder, and I plan to layer it under a thicker jacket, but I get cold very easily. I'm 5'4", 105 pounds, and I ordered XS.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for cooler days when heavier jacket isnt needed
customer_reviews.text: I was in between sizes according to the size chart. I could fit the medium possibly or perhaps the large. Mediums numbers matched better but I ordered the large just incase because I'm a bit busty and glad I did because it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: asmith6kids

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for price
customer_reviews.text: This Columbia zip of fleece is a great bargain compared to other mid weight coats. It is soft and has enough stretch to move without being bulky. My only issue is that it needs to be a little longer for a 1X. It barely makes it to the top of my jeans. When I sized up, it was way to big though. Overall happy at the price point but other busty women may find it shorter than preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shaped fleece jacket
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in a L and color beet red. The style appeared to be the same Columbia style that I had purchased several years ago and still enjoy wearing. The fleece fabric is a bit lighter and overall fit is a big snugger than my older purchase otherwise the style is the same. I had hoped for a brighter red based on the picture. This is a dull red and the color on the zippers is a bit off in terms of a dye match to the fleece fabric. The zippers have an orange cast to them. I will keep the jacket but really wish I could have rated it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: farmgirl85

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought a M and I’m 125lbs and 5’7. So cozy for work. And love the color
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: I love this fleece zipper top!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore Columbia's fleece zipper jackets. This one, in black is my favorite. The material is comfy, and the zipper pockets are so secure, especially for my cell phone. If Amazon has it in stock, but it now!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie E. Verson

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: So warm perfect for what I wanted it for which is the gym! And I will also wear it out because I love the fit and the comfort of being warm I truly recommend this sweater stay to your true size
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tall Gals!
customer_reviews.text: Alright, I am 6’1 and an 8/10 depending on the brand. I was really torn between getting the Medium or Large because of the mixed reviews. I ended up buying the Large and I’m glad I did. The arm length is perfect, if not a bit longer than I expected. There’s a little room in the chest, but it’s perfect for layering. If you want a tighter fit, I would suggest Medium. I’m subtracting one star only because the neck, when fully zipped up hits my chin at a weird angle. But I can make it work! But besides that, this a solid layering jacket for tall ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Sophster

customer_reviews.title: great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this jacket. I was looking for something light colored for the transition from winter to spring when you still need something fairly warm and this fills the need. It is well made, a reasonable price for a fleece jacket and has lots of pockets, both inside and out. I need to shorten the sleeves a little, but that is not unusual, since I am short. It is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: WPA

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything I wanted in a fleece coat. It’s just as good as a North face and lots cheaper !
customer_reviews.author: Kimmela M Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to see this at my door today. Overall, love the jacket and the color. Its tight at the chest, but I did order a medium. Had I gone with a large, the chest would be fine, but I don't know if the length would fit as well. I'll probably order another in a different color, and get a large to compare. Cute and warm jacket!
customer_reviews.author: kailey

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" and 165 lbs, I ordered this in a medium. It's supposed to be fitted, it's long enough for me and fits great. I ordered it to layer under other jackets when it got colder. However, I wore it out today in weather in the 30s and it was perfect by itself. Kept me warm, I ended up carrying my second jacket instead of wearing it. It did such a great job that I just ordered another one in black!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Polar Fleece Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket! I bought it to wear under my rain jacket or winter coat for extra warmth - but of course, could wear it alone too. It's really sporty looking and very well made. I'm very happy with it! I am very petite (4'10.5") and slim and the XS fits perfectly - even the sleeves - not too long like most other jackets & coats I buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 14-16, 38DDD in the bust, and ordered an XL. It tapers nicely at the waist with a little give but without looking baggy. The arms are longer which I love and the little zippered pocket on the arm is a nice size for some cash and credit cards. It kept me warm on a recent glacier cruise in Alaska. I ordered one in black as well.
customer_reviews.author: DTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Tried on a different Columbia fleece jacket instore that was very similar for a size reference and the L in this fits like the M in that one. Luckily I was getting the large for it to be a little big so it still fits. Also very soft and warm. I do recommend this jacket just size up if you don’t want it right fitting
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaEcho

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket- the fit is good, but it has a little more elastic in the cuffs that I’m not a fan of. Still- great jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, medium thickness.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the medium weight thickness of the fleece. A snug fit when zipped up fully. I’m 5’3”, 128 lbs. Got a Medium. Outside zip hand pockets, left arm zip pocket and the hem has adjustable toggles. Inside has two big patch pockets. Very well made and good quality zipper. I got 2-one in a kind of pool-blue and the other more of a burnt orange. Both nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: Misquit

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, looks really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and fits like a dream! I ordered a medium, and as a 5'5" 130lb female with a medium bust and a slightly long torso, this fits so well and offers a feminine silhouette. Very soft, super warm, and looking forward to seeing how this holds up during a Maine fall/winter. It feels very promising.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome. It fits like a medium for junior sizes and small for women's sizes. I'd say it fits like a medium in Nike for comparison. I'm a 32DD/24/36 and it fits with plenty of room for a sweater underneath. Fit is very flattering without being tight. Weight is great for about 60-50 degrees with a tshirt under or lower temps with a thermal or long sleeve sweater under. The side seams give the jacket a nice shape - black color was very rich true black. Bottom and wrist edges are tailored and lie flat not bunchy drawstring like similar jackets. Do not hesitate - this jacket is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of length
customer_reviews.text: Short and boxy...ordered a 3x and it was too big in the wrong spots. I'm 5'9 and usually wear a size 22. It was plenty wide in the torso but the length was very short and the shoulders felt a little tight. Disappointed...but I got a screaming deal on it so I think I'll find someone to gift it to.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Neff

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, see through
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the material. I ordered the sea salt color, which is an off white, and the material is very thin. Also there is a lining at the bottom half of the jacket, very clearly seen and not flattering as the line is below my boobs and very visible. Material is also MUCH thinner than Benton springs. Might be better with a darker color but that is not what i was looking for. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S.

customer_reviews.title: Not really form-fitting, the "black" not really black
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, apparently well-made, in a traditional, midweight fleece, for a reasonable cost, from a manufacturer that I trust. I wish it were blacker. It's rather bluish and not as dark as I would like. And I especially wish it were more form-fitting. Sigh. I just couldn't find anything form-fitting that wasn't of doubtful quality or outrageously expensive or made of some faddish "plush" fleece that is sure to shed and wear out long before its time. I'm not in love with this jacket, but it will do as a midweight layer for an upcoming backpack.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marie-Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My all-year-round go-to layer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is a little boxy, sure, but it is long and roomy enough that I can fit it over a sweater or hoodie on those fall days or windy, mountain hikes. I've had it for almost a year and it has yet to become pilly or worn out. It's a Columbia so it's quality. Size-wize: if you want something form-fitting, you could go a size down but it may be tighter if you have broad shoulders or too short if you have long arms like me. I'm 5'9", size 8-10. I got a large and it is roomy but not baggy. The slightly longer back is apreciated to cover the tush :)
customer_reviews.author: A Bouv

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is my favorite jacket out of all the ones I own. It is so comfortable, the pockets with zippers is a nice touch, it is warm but not too warm. This is a good jacket for 40°-60°F weather (I live in WA state). Not the best for rain but it isn't waterproof and I knew that before buying. I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: mellynjoy

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable, nice form fitting style
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and comfortable, nice form fitting style. Not too short. I’m 5’9” 155 lbs. bought a small in blue- very cute and cozy. I took off a star because the zipper on the pockets it’s kinda scratchy. Still love this jacket to wear alone or layer under a coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's too tight for my liking.  Will order a large.
customer_reviews.text: Although the jacket is lovely and good quality, it's too small. After reading the reviews and taking measurements, I was confident in buying the Medium. I needed a Large. Luckily, I know people who would like the Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Note for tall ladies
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking jacket. My only beef is Columbia tends to cut their women’s jackets rather short, so if you’re tall like me, it can look a little goofy. Nonetheless, it’s warm and pretty, so I will keep it and be goofy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3", 145 lbs & 34D. I purchased a medium and it fits perfectly (for me). The sleeves are a bit long, but I usually end up rolling the sleeves of my jackets/cardigans up about an inch so that my wrists are exposed so it's pretty much just how I wanted it. I originally owned an X-small that I purchased back in 2012 but I unfortunately grew out of; it's lasted up until now so I know that this jacket will get some great wear out of it.
customer_reviews.author: anicole

customer_reviews.title: First time ordering a Columbia jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black sweater in Large. I am 5'9", 165- 170 lbs, 36 Bust & 42 Hip. I have long arms and this fit really nicely. The struggles of being long and tall. The color is more of a dark grey. I hope this doesn't turn lighter once I start to wash it. We'll have to see how well it holds up. I wear a long sleeve underneath and I'm still able to move freely. This sweater will be perfect for a morning walk or a trip to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S.

customer_reviews.title: CUT SMALL !
customer_reviews.text: NOT TRUE TOO SIZE !! EXTRA LARGE FIT WAY TOO TIGHT..I AM USUALLY A MEDIUM. THIS FIT ME MORE LIKE A SMALL..
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the jacket & price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Excellent price. This jacket would of cost me double the price at Dicks etc compared to Amazon. It was a little tight. I did have to return the original one I bought & get the next size up. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Leona

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me. But quality seems good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought size XL. It is too small for me but I’m keeping it because my return window has closed. The most difficult fit is under my arm. The shoulders seem narrow. I would purchase this again but two sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: quilt artist

customer_reviews.title: Bright Bright Bright pink color!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty color. I expected it to be more of an orange/pink color but it's a bright pink. The fit is good, slightly loose. I purchased a Medium. 118 lbs, 5'1".
customer_reviews.author: cal

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more please
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased about this jacket. It is lightweight but keeps me warm. It isn't bulky and fits perfectly in my backpack when I am traveling. The overall fit is perfect and I couldn't be more happy about my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carla R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these year round!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect look and easy throw on for winter in MN around the bonfire, boating, anywhere you need it to take the chill off! Great fit , super quality after many washes, and cute too! I have the melon color, royal blue and black! They last for years! Don’t change a thing Columbia!
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Quality! Comfort! Style! My gf loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for me GF for Christmas! She wears it everyday! She has 3 fleeces and always grabs this one! She loves the way it looks, fits, and how comfortable and soft it is! Buy it! She will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Train

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fleece
customer_reviews.text: Great color and nice feel to fleece. Color is bright and just right. Keeps you warm!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: will be just perfect. It is kind like "light black"
customer_reviews.text: If the color 'black' will be a true black, will be just perfect. It is kind like "light black", or you might call it "dark charcoal". Otherwise I will have a second one. It is very comfy. Wash and wear. I am going to wait for 2, 3 years to order another one if is still exist, and , hope will be different factory make for them, Maybe the black will be darker. I sent an email to the maker about that color, no response.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina L Schlaile

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: So warm and cozy!!! True to size and very nice quality 😌😌 I’m a tall girl with long arms and it fits exactly how it should! Very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Columbia jacket. Fits true to size and washed up very well. This jacked does not have a liner but is still very warm and comfortable. It does not offer the warmth of a heavier jacket for the extremely cold days but is perfect for mild winters and shopping trips when you go in the stores and the heat is on blast. The jacket is very easy to keep up with and not to bulky to lug around with you. As a bonus I took this jacket to my local embroiderer and had initials added to the left side. This was a big hit for a Christmas present for my mom & sister in law!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie rorie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife and she loved it. I rarely buy my wife clothes so I was nervous about he size. I bought a Medium and my wife is 5'4" around 120 lbs. It fit nicely, not too tight, not too loose. She loved everything but the little dangly string on the sleeve for zipping the pocket. However, it was easily removed and there is a zipper handle. We live in the Southern US so we don't get a harsh winter. This coat provides just the right amount of warmth. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brian Treadaway

customer_reviews.title: I love the pocket on the upper arm and the fleece ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've bought a "women's" fleece as opposed to a regular unisex one so I was a little unsure about size (my previous one was a medium) but I ended up going with a large because I'm usually a size up on women's clothing that is more fitted. It worked out perfectly and I can probably layer a jacket or sweatshirt underneath if needed. I love the pocket on the upper arm and the fleece material is very soft and cozy :)
customer_reviews.author: 21sap

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: This is not the jacket I received. I received a different brand jacket with the Columbia tag attached (clearly doesn't match the label and was a completely different jacket). On top of that, it had a yellow crusty stain. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Janson

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about ordering this jacket, then you should without hesitation Cozy, warm, slimming and it has pockets galore. Two inside deep pockets, two outside pockets with zippers and one small zippered pocket on the sleeve, to place a key/driver's license, but maybe not your phone. I love this jacket. I'm 5'3", 130 lbs. and Medium is perfect. The sleeves are a little long, but so are a lot of long sleeve shirts that I buy. I must have tyrannosaurus rex arms.
customer_reviews.author: drolsy53

customer_reviews.title: Favorite new fleece jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review, but I felt the need to share. I received this item just earlier this week and have already worn it a couple times, once while hiking. It's super lightweight but does an excellent job of keeping warm. I took another reviewers suggestion and ordered a little larger than I thought I would want so there is ample room under the arms and that worked out perfectly! It's nice and form fitting (but not too snug) on the torso with plenty of room to move the arms and it doesn't cut up into my armpit. The sleeves are a little more baggy/wide than I would like, but it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: A. Petersburg

customer_reviews.title: Most favorite jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love these jackets, so soft and fitted just right. I would own every color if I could they are so cozy and has a flattering fit. I am true to a size small and the small fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Warm jacket, nice style.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft fleece, fit is true to size. It does fit more close to the body, than some of the other Columbia jackets I have. If you prefer a looser fit, definitely order the next size up. I would not recommend putting this in a clothes dryer after washing. Better to hang dry, or it will shrink for sure.
customer_reviews.author: v. palladino

customer_reviews.title: Faded jacket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black and it looks perfect in the model in the website. False interpretation of the color, I got a faded black almost in gray color and looks like a used jacket when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: gurly

customer_reviews.title: Durable and classic
customer_reviews.text: This fleece exceeded my expectations. I recently traveled on a multi-city itinerary, which got extended by four days, and afforded no opportunity to do laundry. I practically lived in this fleece, which held up to the overuse, and it wasn't too warm or bulky underneath a thin winter coat . I am considering the purchase of another!
customer_reviews.author: Lala Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for a chilly day.
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. It is my go to on chilly days. They run a little larger so I went down a size and glad I did. I probably could have went down 2, but I like my clothes a little snug. If you follow the washing instructions the fleece stays nice and soft. I never dry mine, I always hang it up and the fabric is just as soft as the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Msharpe

customer_reviews.title: This fits comfortable enough to wear one or two layers underneath or ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in medium. I have this same fleece in Florida Gator Blue. I'm 5'7" and wear size 4-6 dresses. This fits comfortable enough to wear one or two layers underneath or a sweater. It is a fitted, tailored style so it does not look boxy like some other fleece jackets. The extra zippered pocket on the left arm is a plus and one of the reasons I bought this style. The fleece washes and wears well. It continues to look good and fleece does not pil. It is warm for those cool south Florida days and evenings and can be layered over or under other clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: More flattering than the regular Columbia zip-up jackets
customer_reviews.text: This is what I would call a "trimmed fit" jacket that is very flattering. It is warm and comfortable. I now have 3- a black, white, and navy that are perfect for daily wear during our mild winters. I like the structure it has and that the cuffs are straight and don't cinch with elastic, it maintains a sleek look that isn't frumpy like other zip up jackets.
customer_reviews.author: MMarti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and very soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 other fleeces from Columbia in size M, but for this one I chose L, because I plan to wear it on top of a shirt. Not sure that medium would have been too small, but the large isn't too big either, so I'm glad I chose this size which will allow me more space if I wear it as a light coat or something. As the other fleece jackets and shirts by Columbia - it's super soft and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Hadas

customer_reviews.title: Warm yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for chilly mornings outside. I like a slightly fitted jacket and this one is. Not too but just enough to not look boxy. I am 5’10”, wear an 8 and the medium is perfect. Roomy and sleeves are long enough. Love the Salt color.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket and color
customer_reviews.text: Love Columbia fleece jackets for my dog walking, zip pockets are awesome. Ladies fit is small so order larger if you want to wear it over other clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket & great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket. It is very comfortable. The sleeves are a little too long & could be a little longer in length. I probably could’ve ordered a size smaller but was worried about it being too short!
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable jacket. A must have.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is soft, fitted, light and warm. I bought it solely to wear to classes. It keeps me warm but isn't bulky and a plus is that it's fitted in a flattering way but comfortable all at the same time. Columbia in my opinion has always been a quality brand and everything I've ever purchased has held up well. I expect the same with this jacket. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice spring and fall jacket
customer_reviews.text: These are nice jackets, I have a few colors, I like the pockets, and they wash really nice
customer_reviews.author: Dawn D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and warm jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very comfortable. Just the perfect fit. It's not very heavy but just the right thickness too it.
customer_reviews.author: Millie Buning

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5"3, 100 lbs, and small was a perfect fit for me. It's soft and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this one.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as an outer layer for winter clothing. I don't like things that are very clingy. The XL is perfect for my purposes. The color is bright and pretty. The fabric is soft and warm without being overly warm. It looks well made and of the quality that I expect of Columbia. It has a lot of pockets, inside and out. The sleeves are a little long (and I have long arms), but they don't have elastic in them and I can just roll them back and it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary user

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for autumn
customer_reviews.text: It is a great looking jacket but I would have liked a little more room.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Not too thick or thin.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart is a bit off. I recommend ordering 1 size up-based on the sizing chart. I’m a 32 bust & ordered a XS based on the size chart. I’m returning it for a small. Can’t wait for the right size to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: The Best Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered xl as I normally wear but it was a little too small in the chest and arm pit area. Had to return but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket. Soft and warm, the color is beautiful. I'm 5.7 and weigh 133 (size 12uk), got the medium and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hadas

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and flattering!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy, great fit, love the tapered waist to this. Definitely more form fitting than the Benton springs jacket but i own multiple of both, love Columbia fleece!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Enginerd

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket, a little pricey, but very nice fit and look, as warm as northface fleece's and price is a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Washed black not dark
customer_reviews.text: The black not very dark it’s washed black color which why I returned it back otherwise the sweater very cute
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Only jacket needed
customer_reviews.text: keeps warmth in without having to have a heavy jacket, like the lightweight and is only one I wear.
customer_reviews.author: JSTBNGMYSLF

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these jackets before and loved them, so when I needed a different size I found it on amazon and ordered.
customer_reviews.author: patricia z. choo

customer_reviews.title: Best fleece ever
customer_reviews.text: I have this fleece in multiple colors. It's durable. Not too hot. Has lots of pockets. Very comfortable and durable. I've had several of mine for over 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: AvdH

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for work
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for work! I bought 3 of these and had our office clinic logo embroidered on them. Its perfect for winter days at work where my nurses are cold. Girls loved the snug fit and I would def recommend these coats for any woman looking for a warm jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Danny Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit & looks sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit & just right for warmth. I love all the pockets too. I wanted a light color to not show dog hair but this color is also very fashionable & not your basic fleece jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket to wear inside during the winter (because I'm always freezing). It is perfect! Not too thick or thin, enough shoulder room, long sleeves, keeps me warm. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: I like this jacket but it collects hair and fuzz
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket but it attracts pet hair and fuzz so badly. I have to lent roll it multiple times a day to not feel gross.
customer_reviews.author: Sher K.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: it fit me kinda loose ish, i got a size small. i’m 5’5 105 pounds and i have lots of room. i like the loose fit tho, if you wanted a tight fit i would size down.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite jacket
customer_reviews.text: Good deal on the jacket. It fits perfect and is so soft/warm
customer_reviews.author: meacot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Columbia fleece jackets are my favorite. This one is smoother material, compared to the classic version. It's also definitely more fitting and has more pockets. Came in originally packaged sealed bag with all tags in place. Totally loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Aliya

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for skiing, quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I went on a ski trip and thought I should buy something warm as an underlayer to my coat. I bought this Fleece. I wore it alot during the fall and beginning of winter. I found that as long as i wore a thick sweater underneath I could go out in pretty cold weather with just this fleece. It's extremely soft has, inside pockets, and the outside pockets have zippers for additional protection. I've had this product for almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia

customer_reviews.title: Other than being cheaply made I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket to wear at work. Honestly, it’s cheaply made but it will suffice for work. The fabric ripped when I put it on for the first time underneath the arms but I was able to fix it. The fit is true to size. Other than being cheaply made I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Laece Ebarb

customer_reviews.title: Fitted cut
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fast track ii. I am a size 14 and typically wear a L top. I purchased the XL. It fits great. It is more fitted than some of the other styles so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: KM Hay

customer_reviews.title: Sleeves too long
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, except sleeves are 5-6" too long. I'm 5'7", fit well everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mechling

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and keeps me warm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size x-small and it indeed fit me well. I am very happy with the fit and the warmth factor. I use it as an outer layer when it is a bit warmer. I used it as a mid layer when it was 15 degree Fahrenheit and it kept me really warm. The only complaint is the color. I ordered "nocturnal" and I think the color in the picture is not a true representation. Otherwise, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natascha

customer_reviews.title: A nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: It's my favorite jacket. It has a lot of pockets. I keep my IPhone in my pocket. It fits perfectly so I try do not gain extra weight, otherwise it would be too tight. It makes me look thinner with my XL size. I wore this jacket with my winter coat to keep me extra warm during a very cold winter. The fleece is not so thick and bulky. I think it will be a perfect jacket for the upcoming spring.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The softer kind of Columbia fleece that you can wear all day
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gahner

customer_reviews.title: I love it and the inside pockets along with the outside ...
customer_reviews.text: Second one I bought. I love it and the inside pockets along with the outside pockets. Great jacket for hikes and outdoor when it’s a bit chilly. The only thing is the color black is a fade black and not a dark black.
customer_reviews.author: SMTWNGalTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fitted jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful color jacket. Too bad it was too small for me. Had to return it for a large in black as the same color in Large is $10 more.
customer_reviews.author: MPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: fits a little snug
customer_reviews.text: women's Columbia jackets are a little tricky. They often want to fit snugger to conform to your shape. I would've liked the jacket to fit a little looser but its doable as is. I bought it for work so no harm done. I can get it on with my scrubs and a long sleeve undershirt on and still be able to move freely.
customer_reviews.author: rlc22Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift awhile back for the misses. She absolutely loved it but the sizing was a lite off. We made it work just dont put it in the dried
customer_reviews.author: JayD

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Practical Fleece
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a fleece that is a lot warmer than it appears. I like the zipper pocket on the sleeve and provides a good fit around the waist. It is fun to wear, practical, and just an all around great fleece. I like how it just flows on the bottom without any elastic. A more modern Columbia version although I am more of a higher end purchaser of fleece with bigger brand names. It is just all around great to wear and pretty impressed with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to wear around my college campus in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear around my college campus in the winter. It doesn't get too cold, but it is very windy here, and this coat did not live up to my expectations. I can feel the wind through the fabric, so it doesn't keep me very warm. It has lasted 3 years though, so it held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brazier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jacket to throw on and keep you cozy!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend had gotten a jacket similar to this from his work that i liked to steal sometimes... (alot). And so i decided to look into purchasing my own. I was hesitant because I was worried it wouldn't keep me very warm, but honestly it's perfect! It keeps you nice and warm, the pockets are a great size! (can fit my Iphone 7 plus no problem) No complaints what so ever. I am very happy with my purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Firenze

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Just the right weight, just tailored enough not to look sloppy but not so technical that it looks out of place in a casual setting. The Nocturnal blue IS subdued, a dusty dark blue. Zipper connects and zips smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Warm comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is a warm sweater. Perfect for 50-70 degree weather. I’m 5’6” 140 lbs, usually a size 4 or 6, 34 b and the small fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Just Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Very seldom write reviews - but I love the jacket. High quality fleece, fits beautifully, great price, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna E. Lokshin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas gift and it’s very pretty and much nicer than the picture
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 1x top but decided to order a 2x. I'm glad I did as it fits very nicely. It isn't very baggy or tight. Just about right. The only problem is that one of the pockets was not stitched properly so there is about 4-5 inches along the bottom that is open.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a well-made fleece that wasn't bulky and fit my petite 5' 2'' 115 lb frame. The XSmall fit perfectly! Great price at $45.90 and free shipping! The sleeves hit right before my knuckles - enough length to keep warm and not too long. The hem comes to the widest part of my hip - just right! Arrived sooner than anticipated! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LEliseStar

customer_reviews.title: I bought the large as a gift for someone who is 5’6” and 170 pounds. It fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for wearing around work or school. It keeps you warm and is comfortable. There are plenty of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: TigerStorm

customer_reviews.title: My arms are a lil claustrophobic
customer_reviews.text: Little tight in the arms and is a medium strength for cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S Jagger

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Fast Trek II Full Zip Soft Fleece Jacket
product_meta.description: Being an industry leader in outdoor apparel and products takes passion, and an understanding of people who love the outdoors as much as we do. That's why, from cutting edge technology, to our innovative heritage in bugaboo, our jackets, pants, fleece, boots, and shoes are all tested tough so you can enjoy the outdoors longer.
feature_bullets: SOFT FABRIC: This Columbia Women's Fast Trek II Full Zip Fleece Jacket is crafted of soft 100% polyster micro fleece for ultimate warmth.
HANDY FEATURES: This Columbia women's fleece jacket features two side zippered security pockets to keep your small items secure and your hands warm.
ULTIMATE COMFORT: With a collared neck and zippered closure, this Columbia women's fleece comfort-stretch jacket is designed to give you ultimate comfort during cold winter days.
CLASSIC FIT: With a modern classic fit, Columbia's Fast Trek II Full Zup Fleece Jacket is light and comfortable enough for outdoor activity.
Columbia's Fast Trek II Full Zip Fleece Jacket is a outdoor staple during cold winters for it's ultimate warmth and comfort.
